Interface Tango::Device_2

Interface Tango::Device_2

interface Device_2
    inherits from Tango::Device
A new release of the basic Device interface. This new release has been introduced mainly to support Tango device server internal polling. Inheritance is used between this new release and the old one. This release mainly defines a new release of the command_inout and read_attributes calls with a new parameter. It also add a new call to read command or attributes result history.

Operation Index

command_inout_2
Execute a command on a device synchronously with one input parameter and one output parameter
command_inout_history_2
Get command history buffer.
command_list_query_2
Query device to see what commands it supports.
command_query_2
Query device to see command argument.
get_attribute_config_2
Read the configuration for a variable list of attributes from a device.
read_attribute_history_2
Get attribute value history buffer.
read_attributes_2
Read a variable list of attributes from a device

Operations

command_inout_2
any command_inout_2(in string command,
                    in any argin,
                    in DevSource source)
    raises(DevFailed);

Execute a command on a device synchronously with one input parameter and one output parameter

Parameters:
command - ascii string e.g. "On"
argin - command input parameter e.g. float
source - The data source. Used to specify if the command result must be read from the polling cache buffer or from the device itself
Returns:
command result.

command_inout_history_2
DevCmdHistoryList command_inout_history_2(in string command,
                                          in long n)
    raises(DevFailed);

Get command history buffer. Return command result history for polled command

Parameters:
command - ascii string e.g. "On"
n - The history depth
Returns:
command history.

command_list_query_2
DevCmdInfoList_2 command_list_query_2()
    raises(DevFailed);

Query device to see what commands it supports. Compared to the Device interface, the command configuration has one more field (The display level)

Returns:
list of commands and their types

command_query_2
DevCmdInfo_2 command_query_2(in string command)
    raises(DevFailed);

Query device to see command argument. Compared to the Device interface, the command configuration has one more field (The display level)

Parameters:
command - name
Returns:
command and its types

get_attribute_config_2
AttributeConfigList_2 get_attribute_config_2(in DevVarStringArray names)
    raises(DevFailed);

Read the configuration for a variable list of attributes from a device. Compared to the Device interface, the attribute configuration has one more field (The display level)

Parameters:
name - list of attribute names to read
Returns:
list of attribute configurations read

read_attribute_history_2
DevAttrHistoryList read_attribute_history_2(in string name,
                                            in long n)
    raises(DevFailed);

Get attribute value history buffer. Return attribute value history for polled attribute

Parameters:
name - ascii string
n - The history depth
Returns:
attribute value history.

read_attributes_2
AttributeValueList read_attributes_2(in DevVarStringArray names,
                                     in DevSource source)
    raises(DevFailed);

Read a variable list of attributes from a device

Parameters:
name - list of attribute names to read
source - The data source. Used to specify if the command result must be read from the polling cache buffer or from the device itself
Returns:
list of attribute values read
